_header: It was a man as I heard say / That to Saint James took the way
_description: The Pilgrim to St. James, in the Northern Homily Cycle

BodSelSup52.First Lines:
yt was aman ose I herd sayþat to sant Iamys toke the
                    way…
BodSelSup52.Last Lines:
…Our lord be þat way vs ledeTo heuyn blys to take our
                    mede

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
HIt was a mon as I herde sayþat to seint Iames hiȝt his
                    way…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Vre lord beo þis wei vs ledeTo heuene and quit vs
                    þer vr mede Amen

EDCPCM.First Lines:

                    yare…

                    þar our med
